name: Greg's Pizzeria
description:
Welcome to your first night at Greg's Pizzeria. You don't actually work here, but you keep coming here anyways. Ignore Carlson, he's just a side character. It's all about Greg here at Greg's Pizzeria!

You will find yourself exhausted from playing this game simply because it is so top notch! With unique, original and questionable game design choices like:

  • Survive five main nights at a Pizzeria, from 12 AM to 6 AM!
  • Doors! You can shut doors and turn on lights!
  • Custom nights like 99/99/99 mode where you can test your true skill!
  • Lore hidden around the Pizzeria for you to find!

And of course, the more common and uninteresting game design choices such as:

  • Use your amazing hearing abilities to hear footsteps!
  • Modifiers to remove lights, half your power, and turn off cameras!
  • An outstanding soundtrack with one song and three ambiences!
  • Weak attempts at comedy!

Can you stop yourself from almost certain death?
